name: obtusifoliol,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (14-methyl cleaving)
definition: Obtusifoliol + 3 [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + 3 Oxygen <=> 4alpha-Methyl-5alpha-ergosta-8,14,24(28)-trien-3beta-ol + Formate + 3 [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + 4 H2O
